definitions.definition: A type of fur from a squirrel with a grey back and white belly, much used on garments in the Middle Ages.
An heraldic fur formed by a regular tessellation of bell shapes in two colours, (for example in the image, blue and white).

main_definition: A type of fur from a squirrel with a grey back and white belly, much used on garments in the Middle Ages.
secondary_definitions: ( heraldry ) An heraldic fur formed by a regular tessellation of bell shapes in two colours, (for example in the image, blue and white).
